bibl.title: Ptolemaic Period Pottery from Mut al-Kharab, Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Description of the site and Ptolemaic deposits. - The pottery: Fabrics; - Surface treatment / Decoration; - Types. - Discussion. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: James C.R. Gill, Ptolemaic Period Pottery from Mut al-Kharab, Dakhleh Oasis.

Roger S. Bagnall, Paola Davoli & Colin A. Hope (edd.), assisted by Bruce E. Parr (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 15 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 231-241, 4 figg., 1 tabl.
Introduction. - Description of the site and Ptolemaic deposits. - The pottery: Fabrics; - Surface treatment / Decoration; - Types. - Discussion. - Conclusions.
